hymn.title: Take the cross with joy
hymn.category: The Way of the Cross—The Way of Life

layout.singingstanza: Take the cross with joy, Walk the nar -- row way, Flow forth life, The Lord no more res -- train! Leave the world be -- hind, Seek naught else but Christ, Flow forth life, The Lord no more res -- train. Flow forth, Flow forth, Flow forth life! O saints, no more de -- lay! Flow forth, flow forth, Flow forth life, The Lord no more res -- train!

lyrics.stanza: Take the cross with joy, Walk the narrow way, Flow forth life, The Lord no more restrain! Leave the world behind, Seek naught else but Christ, Flow forth life, The Lord no more restrain.
Flow forth, Flow forth, Flow forth life! O saints, no more delay! Flow forth, flow forth, Flow forth life, The Lord no more restrain!
